[558] The Castle in the Clouds in the Sky (Ground Floor)
Encounter: ELDRITCH HORROR Foodie Giant
Round 0: dextrial wins initiative!

Round 4: Foodie Giant takes 12 damage.
Round 4: dextrial executes a macro!
Round 4: dextrial casts THRUST-SMACK!
Round 5: Foodie Giant takes 447 damage.
Round 5: dextrial wins the fight!
After Battle: You look to the sky just in time to catch a glimpse of a falling star. Lucky! Well, not really lucky, because you totally knew it was going to be there. 
Your familiar gains a pound: Bookface, the 2 lb. Intergnat
After Battle: N'Shooter surveys the scene from your back, and gains 1 Experience.
After Battle: Bookface waggles his wings at you to distract you, then jabs you with his Beelzebub pitchfork. This refills your MP, somehow.
After Battle: You gain 6 Mojo Points
You gain 480 Meat
After Battle: Bookface does the Harlem Shake, kind of. I mean it doesn't have quite the right anatomy for it but you guess that's what it's going for.
You acquire an item: giant heirloom grape tomato
You acquire an item: chipotle wasabi cilantro aioli
After Battle: Your lucky gold ring gets warmer for a moment. You look down and find a hobo nickel!
You acquire an item: hobo nickel
After Battle: Bookface pops up unexpectedly, interrupting what you're doing, and shoves an advertisement in your face.
You acquire an item: scroll of ancient forbidden unspeakable evil
You acquire an item: BACON

You gain a Mysticality point!

Round 2: dextrial casts POCKET CRUMBS!

Round 3: creepy clown drops 3 defense.
You acquire an item: old school beer pull tab
Round 3: N'Shooter pitches an empty whiskey bottle over your shoulder, hitting your opponent for 16 damage and just barely missing your ear.
Round 3: creepy clown takes 16 damage.
Round 3: Siren pulls out a tiny bowling ball and hurls it at your opponent, striking him for 10 damage.
Round 3: creepy clown takes 10 damage.
Round 3: dextrial wins the fight!
Your familiar gains a pound: Siren, the 13 lb. Red-Nosed Snapper
After Battle: N'Shooter surveys the scene from your back, and gains 1 Experience.
You gain 139 Meat
